curam.util.rules

Class ResultBuffer

  • java.lang.Object
    • curam.util.rules.ResultBuffer

  • public class ResultBuffer
extends java.lang.Object
    This class holds the result text data generated by the ResultTextDecoder class in the form of an object tree and provides methods to return result in XML and tab delimited text format.

    • Method Summary

      Get the rule execution status based on the rule ID and description item value.
      java.lang.String getExecutionStatus(java.lang.String ruleId, java.lang.String[] itemIndex)
      Get the rule execution status based on the rule ID and description item values.

      Returns the array of FilterItem objects with ruleIDs that are to be filtered.

      Returns the current position of the rule set node.

      • getDataItemsUsed

        public java.util.List getDataItemsUsed(java.lang.String nodeID)
                                throws AppException
        Returns the data items used in executing the rule set node with the given node ID.
        Parameters:
        nodeID - rule set node ID.
        Returns:
        Returns the data items used.
        Throws:
        AppException - ID_INVALID_RULESET_NODE - if unable to find the result element with the given nodeID

        Returns the array of FilterItem objects with ruleIDs that are to be filtered.
        Returns:

        See Also:

      • setFilterItems

        public void setFilterItems(FilterItem[] filterItems)
        Sets the array of FilterItem objects with ruleIDs that are to be excluded from the decision.
        Parameters:
        filterItems - FilterItem objects with ruleIDs that are to be filtered.
        See Also:
        ResultBuffer.getFilterItems()

      • getResultAtPosition

        public java.lang.String getResultAtPosition(int position)
        Get result text at the specified position.
        Parameters:
        position - indicates the position of the rule set node.
        Returns:
        result text at the specified position or empty string if the result text cannot be found at that position.

      • getExecutionStatus

        public java.lang.String getExecutionStatus(java.lang.String ruleId)
        Get the rule execution status based on the rule ID.
        Parameters:
        ruleId - the rule ID.
        Returns:
        the rule execution status as one of the following strings:
        • ResultTextWrapper.kSucceededStatus
        • ResultTextWrapper.kFailedStatus
        • ResultTextWrapper.kNotExecutedUnkownStatus

      • getExecutionStatus

        public java.lang.String getExecutionStatus(java.lang.String ruleId,
                                           java.lang.String itemIndex)
        Get the rule execution status based on the rule ID and description item value. For example: getExecutionStatus("id1", "John Smith")
        Parameters:
        ruleId - the rule ID.
        itemIndex - the description item value.
        Returns:
        the rule execution status as one of the following strings:
        • ResultTextWrapper.kSucceededStatus
        • ResultTextWrapper.kFailedStatus
        • ResultTextWrapper.kNotExecutedUnkownStatus

      • getExecutionStatus

        public java.lang.String getExecutionStatus(java.lang.String ruleId,
                                           java.lang.String[] itemIndex)
        Get the rule execution status based on the rule ID and description item values.
        Parameters:
        ruleId - the rule ID.
        itemIndex - the description item values for all the list RDOs nesting the rule item..
        Returns:
        the rule execution status as one of the following strings:
        • ResultTextWrapper.kSucceededStatus
        • ResultTextWrapper.kFailedStatus
        • ResultTextWrapper.kNotExecutedUnkownStatus
